Title: Expands access to mortgage loans for cooperative properties under the homes for veterans program
Summary: Expands access to mortgage loans for cooperative properties under the homes for veterans program, as administered by the state of New York mortgage agency.
LawCode: Add ยง2405-g, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to expanding access to mortgage financing for cooperative properties under the homes for veterans program
